info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued August 14 at 11:33AM AST until August 14 at 5:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat index values exceeding 112 degrees Fahrenheit. * WHERE...Lower elevations and urban areas from the San Juan metropolitan area westward to northwest and west Puerto Rico, Vieques, Culebra, and the US Virgin Islands. * WHEN...through 5 PM AST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Long period of exposure could likely lead to heat exhaustion or heat stroke
info.instruction: Take extra precautions, if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water.
